name: UpdateVendorPaymentDetails
description:
Add or update payment details for a vendor.

Use this tool to add or update payment details for a vendor through the business's approval workflow. Supports ACH and Wire transfer methods, requiring routing and account numbers. The proposal may require approval based on the business's policies.

parameters.name: vendor_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the vendor whose payment details are to be updated. This should be a string.

parameters.name: vendor_payment_details
parameters.description: JSON object with optional nickname, ACH details, wire details, and default indicator. Use for adding or updating vendor payment methods.

account_nickname.description: Optional nickname for the payment account

is_default.description: Whether this should be the default payment method
